title: End-of-life planning talks often fail to communicate goals

title_detail.value: End-of-life planning talks often fail to communicate goals

summary: Too few older adults plan ahead for end-of-life medical decisions. Even when they do identify a loved one to make decisions for them, their preferences are not always communicated or understood, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: Too few older adults plan ahead for end-of-life medical decisions. Even when they do identify a loved one to make decisions for them, their preferences are not always communicated or understood, according to a new study.
